item.title: History of the Internet
item.description: Very nice video created by Melih Bilgil as part of his diploma project PICOL illustrating the history of the Internet from 1957 to 1990. He uses the icons of his design to represent every element of the story. That and a well written voice over, make for a very interesting, easy to understand video. Iâ€™m actually considering asking my teachers to play this as an introduction to our web development classes.
